info.name: LiveJournal homepage cleaner (including ONTD)
info.description:
It removes particular elements from LiveJournal homepage. There are:
- Oh No They Didn't (ONTD)
- Recent Posts
- Search Journals and Communities
- Feature showcase
- Featured Styles
- Gifts, Inbox messages from the Updates

If someone needs to kill only ONTD - let me know and I'll upload ONTD only version.
